price: ߊ߬ ߘߴߏ߬ ߟߎ߬ ߟߊߘߏ߲߬ ߦߙߐ߫ ߘߐ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߘߍ߯ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߘߌ߬ߢߍ߬ ߡߍ߲ ߡߊ߬ ، ߓߊ ߊߟߊ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߟߐ߲ߠߌ߲ߠߊ߫ ߡߎ߬ߢߎ߲߬ߓߊ߮ ߘߌ߫
arabic: لَيُدۡخِلَنَّهُم مُّدۡخَلٗا يَرۡضَوۡنَهُۥۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلِيمٌ حَلِيمٞ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: layud'khilannahum mud'khalan yarḍawnahu wa-inna al-laha laʿalīmun ḥalīmun
